name: Lyxor Net Zero 2050 S&P 500 Climate PAB (DR) UCITS ETF - Daily Hedged to EUR - Acc
summary: The Lyxor Net Zero 2050 S&P 500 Climate PAB (DR) UCITS ETF aims to track the S&P 500 Climate PAB index while incorporating a net-zero 2050 emissions target. It utilizes a daily hedged EUR share class to minimize currency risk for Eurozone investors. Lyxor Asset Management, a subsidiary of Amundi, manages the ETF.
